newsitem.title: UK: Norway's Troll crude to load 7.4 mln bbls in July.
newsitem.headline: Norway's Troll crude to load 7.4 mln bbls in July.

text.p: Norway's Troll oilfield is scheduled to load 7.4 million barrels of crude oil in July compared to 7.2 million barrels in June, traders said on Friday.
The July programme consists of six cargoes of 600,000 barrels, four of 400,000 barrels and one each of one million, 700,000 and 500,000 barrels, they said.
